name: PersonalityDisorderEmotionallyLabile
title: Personality Disorder Emotionally Labile
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for diagnoses related to personality disorders where the patient could not reliably complete a PHQ-9 tool due to their condition.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a diagnosis of personality disorder, including borderline, cyclothymic, histrionic, and factitious disorders.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represent some personality disorders such as narcissistic or obsessive compulsive personality disorders.)

concept.display: Chronic factitious illness with physical symptoms

contains.display: Chronic factitious illness with physical symptoms
